The visuals in the video were confirmed: indicating that it was indeed footage of U.S. President Donald Trump.
The audio in the video was manipulated: suggesting that the words attributed to Trump were not actually spoken by him.
The original video from CBS 17: which captured the same scene, revealed that Trump was primarily listening rather than speaking during that portion of the tour.
The video was created by adding doctored: falsely portraying Trump as insulting his supporters.
